original: gzod nas zhi ba'i chos kun ni //
analyzed: gzod nas zhi ba'i chos kun ni //

original: rkyen dbang 'khrul bar rab snad la //
analyzed: rkyen dbang 'khrul bar rab snad la //

original: de nyid tshe na zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: de nyid tshe na zhi ba nyid //

original: zhi tshe sgyu ma lta bur snang //
analyzed: zhi tshe sgyu ma lta bur snang //

original: 'od gsal cir yang mi sgom pa //
analyzed: 'od gsal cir yang mi sgom pa //

original: mtshams med rnal 'byor pha rol phyin //
analyzed: mtshams med rnal 'byor pha rol phyin //

original: spros pa bkag pas mi rtog shes //
analyzed: spros pa bkag pas mi rtog shes //

original: lte ba'i kha yi bar du bskor //
analyzed: lte ba'i kha yi bar du bskor //

original: ye shes sems dpa' mchod la gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' mchod la gshegs //

original: stong pa bco brgyad brjod bya ste //
analyzed: stong pa bco brgyad brjod bya ste //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i bka' dang n'a g'a rdzu na yi //

original: gsungs pa la brten mos rnams don dang ni //
analyzed: gsungs pa la brten mos rnams don dang ni //

original: bdag nyid sbyang phyir cho ga thabs mchog byas //
analyzed: bdag nyid sbyang phyir cho ga thabs mchog byas //

original: 'di la ngal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des //
analyzed: 'di la ngal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des //
